verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The rocks will cry out
If we do not sing
Lord let our praises bring
An awesome sound
With our hands held high
And our hearts bowed down
Let the songs of our hearts
Reach heaven
Like the saints of old
Who worshipped you on Zion

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Great is the Lord
And Greatly to be praised
Great is the Lord
And Greatly to be praised
Great is the Lord
And Greatly to be praised
